description: Charles II repouss√© tazza; fully marked on rim and with lion passant underfoot; shallow circular dish with wide flat rim embossed in bold relief with a wolf, a boar, a turkey, and a falcon amid undulating stems of leafage and large blossoms with punchwork tendrils; on low, hollow flaring foot with flat rim
markings:
Mark

- Fully marked on upper side of rim.  Lion passant on underside of foot.

[R F]
title: Footed salver
